title: Sepp Kuss Retains Burgos GC Lead in Nail-Biting TT, Vine Fastest in Comeback Win
content:
Kuss carries 5-second lead into Friday's finale at Burgos tour, comeback kid Vine wins in first race back since life-threatening crash in April.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss Retains Burgos GC Lead in Nail-Biting TT, Vine Fastest in Comeback Win on Velo.
author: ahood
